title: AI Image
details: AI Image is a web application that uses the Clarifai API to detect faces in images. It was built using React, Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.

title: Scape InOut
details: Fully accessible audio escape room game. I participated in this project during my journey in thr Apple Developer Academy.

title: AI Chatbot
details: PandasAI Prompt Analyzer is analyzing your dataset with your prompts, its made on the streamlit.

title: MAGIC
details: Magic project is about digitalizing the ancient books and manuscripts. I am responsible for developing the website and increase the readability of the books with AI models.
